title: Tricolor Salad
introduction: Inspired by the bold and vibrant colors of the Italian flag, the Tricolor Salad is a beautiful representation of Italy on a plate. Featuring red radicchio, white endive, and green arugula, this salad not only pays homage to the country's rich culinary tradition but also delivers a mix of flavors and textures that make it a terrific dish for any occasion.
instructions: 1. Trim the vegetables, discarding the outer leaves and any that are bruised. Wash them in several changes of cool water. Dry very well. Cut the endive crosswise into 3 or 4 pieces. Tear the radicchio into bite-size pieces. Trim off the tough stems of the arugula and tear the leaves into bite-size pieces. Place the vegetables in a large salad bowl.

2. Drizzle the vegetables with the oil and toss well. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar and salt until the salt is dissolved. Pour the vinegar over the salad and toss again. Taste the salad and add more oil, vinegar, or salt if needed. Serve immediately.
